entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lanaudière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
